version_description:
CEPTETEB mobil uygulamamızı sizlerden gelen öneri ve istekler doğrultusunda yenilemeye devam ediyoruz.

CEPTETEB’in yeni versiyonu ile birlikte;
•Kredi başvurularınızı CEPTETEB mobil uygulamamız üzerinden anında yapabilir, onaylandığı anda şubeye gitmeden ve günün her saatinde bir tıkla haftasonu dahil kredinizi kullanabilirsiniz.
•Yenilenen kredi kartı başvurusu menüsü ile CEPTETEB mobilden size en uygun kredi kartına hızlıca başvuru yapabilir, avantajlardan faydalanabilirsiniz.
Her türlü soru ve yorumlarınız için sosyal medya kanallarımızdan veya e-posta adresimizden bizimle iletişime geçebilirsiniz.
www.twitter.com/cepteteb www.facebook.com/cepteteb mobildestek@teb.com.tr

CEPTETEB continues to be renewed throughout recommendations and requests from you.

With this update;
•You can make loan applications on CEPTETEB mobile application and use your credit as soon as your loan is approved without going to a branch.
•With the renewed credit card application menu, you can apply for the credit card that suits you best and benefit from the advantages.

If you have any questions, be sure to contact us on social media accounts or e-mail addresses.
www.twitter.com/cepteteb
www.facebook.com/cepteteb
mobildestek@teb.com.tr

CEPTETEB Mobil Uygulamamızı, sizlerden gelen talep ve öneriler doğrultusunda yenilemeye devam ediyoruz.

CEPTETEB’in yeni versiyonu ile Kurumsal Mobil Şubeden;
•Kartlar menüsü ile kredi kartı bilgilerinizi inceleyebilir, kart borcunuzu ödeyebilirsiniz.
•Ekstre detaylarınız ile dönem içi ve sonraki dönem işlemlerinizi inceleyebilirsiniz.
•Krediler menüsünden Patron Kart taksitli ve / veya sezon ödemeli kredi limitleriniz ile borç bilgilerinizi inceleyebilirsiniz.
•Patron Kart’tan taksitli kredi kullanabilir, kullandığınız kredinin ödemelerini yapabilirsiniz.
Her türlü soru ve yorumlarınız için sosyal medya kanallarımızdan veya e-posta adresimizden bizimle iletişime geçebilirsiniz.

www.twitter.com/cepteteb
www.facebook.com/cepteteb
mobildestek@teb.com.tr

CEPTETEB continues to be renewed throughout recommendations and requests from you.

With this new version in Corporate Mobile Branch you can;
•View your credit card details on the Cards Menu and make your credit card payment.
•Examine your credit card statement, current and upcoming transactions.
•You can check your “Patron Kart” installment and/or seasonal loans limits and debt status.
•With your “Patron Kart”, you can use your credit and make your repayments.

If you have any questions, be sure to contact us on social media accounts or e-mail addresses.

CEPTETEB Mobil Uygulamamızı, sizlerden gelen talep ve öneriler doğrultusunda yenilemeye devam ediyoruz.

CEPTETEB’in yeni versiyonu ile;

•Hisse Senedi işlemlerini gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
•Kredi kartı kampanyalarına anında katılım sağlayabilir ve takip edebilirsiniz.
•Bize Yazın menüsü ile öneri ve taleplerinizi bize iletebilirsiniz.
•TEFAS ile başka banka fon alış/satış işlemlerini gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
•Hızlı ödeme/ transfer işlemlerinizi silebilirsiniz.

CEPTETEB Kurumsal Mobil Şubeden;

•Kartınız için Taksitlendirme/ Öteleme veNakit Avans/ Taksitli Nakit Avans işlemlerini yapabilirsiniz.
•Döviz alış/satış işlemlerini gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.
•Kartınıza limiti belirleyebilir, son ödeme tarihi ve ekstre döviz cinsini değiştirebilirsiniz.

Her türlü soru ve yorumlarınız için sosyal medya kanallarımızdan veya e-posta adresimizden bizimle iletişime geçebilirsiniz.

www.twitter.com/cepteteb
www.facebook.com/cepteteb
mobildestek@teb.com.tr



CEPTETEB continues to be renewed throughout recommendations and requests from you.

With this update you can;

•Make stock exchange transactions.
•Join credit card campaigns and follow.
•Send us your suggestions and requests on “Contact Us” menu.
•Make TEFAS fund transactions.
•You can delete quick payment records.


With this new version in Corporate Mobile Branch you can;

•Make installement/deferral and cash advance/ cash advance with installement transactions for your credit card.
•Buy/Sell foreign currency.
•Change the card limit, due date and statement currency type.

If you have any questions, be sure to contact us on social media accounts or e-mail addresses.

Dilediğiniz zaman Ayarlar menüsünden tek bir tuşla tüm kredi kartlarınızı internet alışverişlerine açıp kapatabilirsiniz.
CEPTETEB Kurumsal Mobil Şubeden;
Toplu yabancı para transferi (Swift) onay ve iptal işlemlerini gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.

With this update ;

You can see all notifications from the Notification Center. So, you never miss the campaigns!

On the Campaign page, you can see the discount and bonus you earned from your cards. Also, you can follow
the status of the campaigns you joined, and see how close you to reach the campaign goal.

Did you hear about Member Get Member Campaign? Bring your Buddy to CEPTETEB, win Bonus, Discount or a
Surprise. For more details, you can visit the Campaign Page.

Corporate customers can request new material and do failure report for POS terminals by using POS Menu.

With the new version of our application;

· From the Notification Settings menu in the Control Panel, you can use our free notification services for many banking transactions, such as credit cards, payments and investment transactions,

· With using TEB FX PLATFORM, you can exchange your transactions with advantageous exchange rates.

· With using Sabiha Gökçen Fast Track system and TAV Passport for free, you can fly without waiting any queue. Moreover, it is enough to have any CEPTETEB product!

We continue to enhance your banking experience with the CEPTETEB mobile application. Here we are with the newly updated version that offers many advanced features.

· With just one tap, you can view the contracts you have approved digitally.

· Our main screen now has a special "dark theme" for our Star Banking Customers. You can also view investment strategy reports through the Investment menu.

Becoming a CEPTETEB user just got a whole lot easier

All you need do is download and install the CEPTETEB app, fill out the “SIGN UP” form, and send it to us. After a quick video chat from wherever you may be you’ll become a CEPTETEB user in just minutes.

As a CEPTETEB user you have quick and convenient access to all of your financial services needs as Finance Coach, 5/24 TEB FX, mobile payments, no-fee money transfers, QR-code cash deposits/withdrawals. You’ll also be able to take advantage of other benefits such as quick-access at airports and a 50% discount in digital platform membership fees.

For more details, check out cepteteb.com.tr.

­ - You can update your phone number and e-mail information registered to our Bank in the contact settings.
­ - You can make payment for National Lottery Game of Chance.

You can enjoy a more pleased CEPTETEB experience thanks to the performance improvement works.

Dear Customer,

We are working on making improvements in our CEPTETEB mobile banking app in line with your requests and suggestions. With the new version of the app:
• You can enjoy a pleasant travel experience with the changes made in the Fast Track campaign conditions.
• You can access the reports we’ve prepared for you from our Investment Strategies menu.
• If you are already an active user of the CEPTETEB Mobile Banking App, you can quickly approve the forms -that you need to sign for product applications from our Branches- on the CEPTETEB App, without the need for a wet signature.
You can enjoy a more pleased CEPTETEB experience thanks to the performance improvement works.
